parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the reserved instance.

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceId
parameters.description: The new name of the reserved instance. The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length. It must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`. It can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceName
parameters.description:
The new description of the reserved instance. The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length. It cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

This parameter is empty by default.
